name: PTEND DEMOGAME
description:
Horror play the story of a person who returned to his old house, which he did not live in for 6 years, but I was surprised that it is haunted and there is another person with him in his house, and it is your turn to get him out of a house ... who does not welcome new people

I have attended a description of playing with a scary penguin... I am bad at describing the important game of my creation, I hope you like it
